flirt_messages: you're like bubble tea... i wanna suck you through a straw 😳🧋
are you a hdb lift? cuz i get excited every time you go up and down 😏🏢
you're like my cpf... i wanna invest in you for the long term 💰👴
wanna netflix and chill? i got disney+ also if you prefer wholesome stuff 😉📺
wanna go jb with me? i promise no funny business... maybe just a little 😏🇲🇾
you make me harder than getting bto flat on first try leh 🏗️😤
you're like grab surge pricing... expensive but i still want you 💸🚗
wanna be my study buddy? we can practice biology together 😏📚
jokes: why did the chicken cross the road? to get to the other side... just like how i crossed oceans to be with you 😂❤️
knock knock! who's there? orange. orange who? orange you glad we're together? 🍊💕
why don't scientists trust atoms? because they make up everything... just like how you make up my whole world 🔬💫
why don't eggs tell jokes? they'd crack each other up! just like how you crack me up daily 🥚😂
what do you call a dinosaur that crashes his car? tyrannosaurus wrecks! don't worry i'm a safe driver 🦕🚗
why did the math book look so sad? because it had too many problems! good thing you solve all mine 📚💝
what do you call a bear with no teeth? a gummy bear! sweet just like you 🐻🍯
pep_talks: eh babe, you're stronger than you think! remember when you conquered that impossible assignment? you got this! 💪✨
bad day? doesn't define you lah. you're like a phoenix - always rising from the ashes more beautiful than before 🔥🕊️
hey gorgeous, storms don't last forever but strong people like you do. weather this and shine brighter! ⛈️🌈
you know what? you're not just surviving, you're thriving! look how far you've come, i'm so proud 🌟❤️
feeling down? that's okay. even diamonds need pressure to sparkle. you're my precious gem 💎✨
tough times are like gyms for the soul - you come out stronger. and babe, you're already a champion 🏆💪
you're like wifi - even when i can't see you, i know you're there supporting everyone around you 📶💕
bad days are just life's way of making good days feel even better. your good days are coming! 🌅🎉
you're not just a survivor, you're a warrior princess. and warriors don't give up! ⚔️👸
remember: you've overcome 100% of your bad days so far. that's a perfect track record! 📈💫
